scripts.start: concurrently "cd addtocart && yarn start" "cd cart && yarn start" "cd home && yarn start" "cd pdp && yarn start " "cd server && yarn start:dev"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd addtocart && yarn build && yarn build:start" "cd cart && yarn build && yarn build:start" "cd home && yarn build && yarn build:start" "cd pdp && yarn build && yarn build:start" "cd server && yarn build && yarn start:prod"
